body_content.explanation: a number that results from dividing one whole number by another:
examples: ¼ and 0.25 are different ways of representing the same fraction.

body_content.explanation: a small part of something, or a small amount:
examples: Although sexual and violent crimes have increased by 13 percent, they remain only a tiny/small fraction of the total number of crimes committed each year.
They can produce it at a fraction of the cost of (= much more cheaply than) traditional methods.
Could you just move a fraction to the right, so I can get by?
